decks.notes: This deck focuses on quickly deploying small, aggressive creatures like Monastery Swiftspear and Dragon's Rage Channeler, while disrupting the opponent with burn spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart. It also utilizes cantrips like Preordain and Expressive Iteration to ensure consistent card draw and smooth gameplay. The deck aims to apply pressure early on and maintain tempo throughout the game, utilizing cards like Violent Urge and Slickshot Show-Off to capitalize on creature damage and close out the game efficiently.

This deck utilizes artifact synergies to quickly overwhelm the opponent with a barrage of threats and disruption. By combining efficient creatures like Cori-Steel Cutter with powerful artifacts and spells like Mishra's Bauble and Unholy Heat, the deck aims to create a fast-paced aggressive game plan that can quickly close out games before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. The inclusion of Tormod's Crypt and Metallic Rebuke provide additional disruption and interaction, while cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Emry, Lurker of the Loch offer card advantage and recursion to keep the pressure on.

This deck focuses on aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent and deal damage efficiently. Utilizing a mix of multicolor creatures and spells, it aims to control the board with Leyline Binding and Leyline of the Guildpact while also maintaining pressure with cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Scion of Draco. Consign to Memory provides additional removal options, while Stubborn Denial helps protect key threats. The mana base is optimized for quick and consistent access to the necessary colors.

This deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent while disrupting their resources through targeted removal and disruptive cards. The combination of aggressive creatures like Phelia and Ragavan with powerful spells like Solitude and Consign to Memory allows for a fast and efficient way to close out games. Additionally, cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Ephemerate provide further disruption and value. The deck aims to control the board and tempo of the game while maintaining a consistent aggressive threat to quickly finish off the opponent.

This deck focuses on generating a quick and aggressive board presence through the use of artifacts, particularly with the Affinity mechanic. It uses cards like Mox Opal and Mishra's Bauble to ramp up quickly and overwhelm the opponent with threats like Cori-Steel Cutter and Emry, Lurker of the Loch. The deck also incorporates disruptive elements like Metallic Rebuke and Unholy Heat to control the board and maintain its advantage. The inclusion of Urza's Saga helps to tutor for key artifacts and further solidify its game plan.

The deck focuses on utilizing artifacts to quickly ramp up mana and control the board, while also having aggressive creatures to pressure opponents. It also aims to disrupt opponents' strategies by using cards like Engineered Explosives, Tormod's Crypt, and Metallic Rebuke. Emry, Lurker of the Loch is a key card that helps recur artifacts from the graveyard, while Urza's Saga provides additional value by tutoring for powerful artifacts. The deck combines aggro elements with artifact synergy to create a fast and efficient strategy in Modern 1 vs 1 games.

This deck focuses on utilizing efficient aggressive creatures and burn spells to deal damage quickly and win the game before the opponent can stabilize. Key cards include Monastery Swiftspear, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Lightning Bolt for direct damage, as well as cards like Slickshot Show-Off and Cori-Steel Cutter to further pressure the opponent. The deck also includes cantrips like Preordain and Mishra's Bauble to help with card selection and maintain card advantage. Overall, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and lethal assault.

The main focus of this UW Control deck is to disrupt the opponent's strategy through a combination of counter spells, removal spells, and card draw effects. By utilizing cards like Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi, Time Raveler to limit the opponent's options and applying pressure with cards like Solitude and Subtlety, the deck aims to control the game and gradually take over with powerful threats. The inclusion of cards like March of Otherworldly Light and LÃ³rien Revealed also provides additional utility and card advantage to out value the opponent.

The main idea behind this deck is to quickly establish a board presence and overwhelm your opponent with aggressive plays. By utilizing artifact creatures and various mana acceleration cards, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. The inclusion of card draw and counter spells helps to maintain momentum and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga are key components of the deck, providing additional value and recurring threats. Overall, the deck focuses on tempo and efficient resource management to secure victories in fast-paced matchups.

The concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly and aggressively overwhelm your opponent with a combination of powerful creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, supported by disruptive spells and enchantments. The deck aims to control the battlefield with cards like Blood Moon and Goblin Bombardment while maintaining pressure with efficient creatures. Utilizing cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Seasoned Pyromancer for card advantage and board presence, the deck aims to close out games quickly before the opponent can stabilize.

The main concept of this deck revolves around using Simic Birthing Ritual to ramp up quickly and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and disruption spells. The deck includes powerful cards like Force of Negation for control, Shardless Agent for card advantage, and Abhorrent Oculus for pressure. By utilizing Coiling Oracle and Ice-Fang Coatl for additional card draw and board presence, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while building towards a strong board state. With a mix of tempo plays and powerful creatures, the deck looks to establish dominance early in the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing a variety of creatures with unique abilities to create powerful combos and control the board. Agatha's Soul Cauldron and Malevolent Rumble provide ways to generate value and control the opponent's board while Grist, the Hunger Tide and Yawgmoth, Thran Physician offer powerful creature removal and card advantage. The inclusion of Wall of Roots and Orcish Bowmasters provide additional utility and protection, while Delighted Halfling and Young Wolf offer resilient threats. The deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory.

The main concept of this UR Aggro deck is to quickly and efficiently deal damage to the opponent using low-cost spells and creatures. By utilizing cards like Monastery Swiftspear, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Slickshot Show-Off, the deck aims to put pressure on the opponent early in the game. The inclusion of cards like Lava Dart, Lightning Bolt, and Mutagenic Growth allows for direct damage to be dealt while maintaining board presence. The deck also includes card draw and selection with Expressive Iteration and Preordain to keep a steady stream of threats coming.

This deck focuses on disrupting your opponent's game plan while applying pressure with aggressive creatures. Utilizing a mix of hand disruption, removal spells, and efficient creatures, the deck aims to control the board and slow down the opponent's strategy. By combining creatures with powerful abilities and disruptive spells, the deck can grind out wins by out-valuing the opponent and overwhelming them with a combination of aggressive threats and disruption. The deck's strength lies in its ability to disrupt the opponent's plans while applying consistent pressure to close out the game quickly.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures and burn spells to quickly damage the opponent's life total, while also utilizing cards like Mishra's Bauble and Expressive Iteration to filter through the deck for more threats. It includes cheap and efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt and Lava Dart to clear the way for attacks, as well as pump spells like Mutagenic Growth and Violent Urge to enhance the damage output. The inclusion of Murktide Regent provides a powerful threat in the late game, ensuring continuous pressure on the opponent.

This deck focuses on quickly deploying artifact creatures and utilizing various cheap artifacts to enable powerful synergies with cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Saga. By quickly ramping out threats and disrupting the opponent with removal and disruption, it aims to overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of aggressive plays. The deck also utilizes cards like Thoughtcast and Mishra's Bauble to generate card advantage and ensure the deck can maintain a high tempo throughout the game.
